question: Ibaadat Khana which was constructed by Akbar at fatehpur Sikri was basically for the purpose of ______?
option1: Discuss matters related to propagation of Islam
option2: Discuss matters related to expansion of Din-i-Ilahi
option3: Discuss matters related to all religions
answer: Discuss matters related to all religions
explanation: Abul Fazal encouraged Akbar for debates on doctrinal and philosophical enquiries. Akbar displayed a curiosity in these discussions. The debate took place in the Ibadat Khana or Hall of Worship. The Ibadat Khana is now recognized to be the Diwan-i-Khas, which was founded in 1574 at the City of Fatehpur Sikri. It was opened for Sunni Muslims initially and was opened to all religions viz. Sufis, Shias, Christians, Zoroastrians, Hindus and Jains.
